pages.text: $(li)Saddle can be used to ride $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pigs$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horses$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrade$(/l) right clicking on them while you are holding a Saddle in your hand.

$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/leatherworker)Leatherworkers$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by Saddles, they can be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:illagers/ravager)Ravagers$(/l) drops them upon death.
